infoNote: Ticket details will be sent to your email, the 'Notifications' section in the app, or 'My Tickets' in the booking service.
note1: This movie is suitable for all ages.
note2: Tickets once purchased are non-refundable and non-exchangeable.
note3: If you do not receive the ticket code within 30 minutes after completing the payment, please contact our hotline *6789 for assistance.
note4: Cinemas are not allowed to serve customers under 13 years old for screenings after 22:00 and under 16 years old for screenings ending after 23:00.
termsAgreement: I confirm and agree to the
agreeRequired: You must agree to the terms!
editSeatsInstruction: Edit seat position above or here
pleaseSelectSeat: Please select your seat(s) to proceed

seatValidation.maxTenSeats: You can only select up to 10 seats.
seatValidation.leaveGapInMiddle: You cannot leave a gap between selected seats.
seatValidation.mustPickLastSeat: You must select the last seat if you pick the one next to it.
